Game.Name: Star Wars - Jedi Power Battles (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es)
Game.plot: Choose your Jedi (either Qui-Gon Jinn, Obi-Wan Kenobi or Mace Windu) and fight the forces of the Trade Federation through the planet Naboo, facing plenty of droids and Darth Maul himself.Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulTo get all levels and play them with darth maul, enter VMT3XRM in the resume game section. Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulEnter the password NMH0YQR to play as Qui-Gon, Mace Windu, Obi-Wan, and Darth Maul on all levels.Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulNow, I am back with more codes. I don't have ALL the Darth Maul codes, but I only lack 3 of them. Lv.2:VMT3D1K Lv.3:VMT3GFK Lv.5:VMT3JPK Lv.6:VMT3NMK Lv.7:VMT3Q5K I'll be back with 8,9, and 10 level codes after I get through the levels.Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulAll levels, 7 Darth Mauls: 1: VMT3BYJ 2: VMT3D*K 3: VMT3GKL 4: VMT3JTL 5: VMT3L2L 6: VMT3N*L 7: VMT3QKM 8: VMT3STM 9: VMT3V2M 10: VMT3X*M Note: 7 means 7 in reserve. I should have specified this in my previous 2 posts (Obi-Wan codes & Qui-Gon Jinn codes). Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulGo to resume game and put in MBJ3BYG Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulEnter the code VMT3BYJCheat: All levels with Darth MaulEnter 4MF0ZLP at the resume game screenCheat: All levels with Darth MaulLevel 1:You dont need this because you always start the game at level 1. Level 2: WB1BCPF You have to play as Mace Windu Level 3: VCJMBFF You have to play as Mace Windu Level 4: VC1MBPF You have to play as Mace Windu Level 5: VCJNBYF You have to play as Mace Windu Level 6: VC1DBYF You have to play as Mace Windu Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulV C J O X Y K - Level Select for Mace Windu or Darth Maul V H R 3 B F J - Level Select for Qui-Gon JinnCheat: All levels with Darth MaulHere are codes from level 7 through 10 (since 1-6 have allready been shown) level-7 VCGYCFH =6 LIVES level-8 VCXYCFH =6 LIVES level-9 VCDZCPH =6 LIVES level-10 VCVZCPH =6 LIVES Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulLEVEL 1= ALREADY SHOWN LEVEL 2=VMT3DGK(THIS ONE IS THE SAME as my old one) LEVEL 3=VMT3G0K (I THINK THIS ONE HAS 5 LIVES) LEVEL 4=VMT3J8K (5 LIVES) LEVEL 5=VMT3LHL (5 LIVES) LEVEL 6= VMT3NRL (5 LIVES) The other i submitted has less lives so it might be better to use theseCheat: All levels with Darth MaulHello again! I went to church on Dec.23 and found myself incredibly bored. So I started playing my Star Wars game and put in the code for Darth Maul. Well, I played and got through to the seventh level with 6 lives. Here are the new, updated codes I found. LV.2:VMT3D1K LV.3:VMT3JJL LV.4:VMT3LSL LV.5:VMT3N1L LV.6:VMT3QKM I'LL BE BACK SOON WITH THE REST OF THE LEVEL CODES. I'M WORKING AT IT, BUT IT'S HARD TO KEEP 6 TO 8 LIVES ALL THE WAY THROUGH.Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulAll levels, 7 Obi-Wans: 1: n/a 2: WFJ3BPG 3: XFJ3BYG 4: YFJ3B6G 5: ZFJ3BFH 6: 0FJ3BPH 7: 1FJ3BYH 8: 2FJ3B6H 9: 3FJ3BFJ 10: 4FJ3BPJ Note the patterns... Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulOk I have found these through much tiresome work on the game, but they're worth it. Lv.2:VHN3B6F Lv.3:VML3B6F Lv.4:VR13BFG Lv.5:VW13BPG Lv.6:(the first code gives 3 lives, the other is for experts) V013BYG, expert:V0B3BYF Lv.7:V413BBG Lv.8:VCY3BBG Lv.9:V8Z3BBG Lv.10:(sorry, no extra lives) V0C3BYH (Must be Qui-Gon to use these) Also on a personal note: I found the last code on accident by altering two of the letters on the level 6, Code 1. Cheat: All levels with Darth MaulAll levels, 7 Qui-Gons: 1: n/a 2: VHS3BPG 3: VMS3BYG 4: VRS3B6G 5: VWS3BFH 6: V0S3BPH 7: V4S3BYH 8: V8S3B6H 9: VCT3BFJ 10: VHT3BPJCheat: All Players With 7 Lives On All LevelsEnter the password 5PT80KW to play as Qui-Gon, Mace Windu, Obi-Wan, and Darth Maul on all levels with 7 lives on each and every level.
Game.Developer: LucasArts Entertainment Company LLC, THQ Inc.
Game.Notes: Deflect. Defeat. Destroy! Let the Force guide you to victory. Take back the Theed Royal Palace in fast and furious lightsaber assaults as one of three powerful Jedi: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, or Mace Windu.
